definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Study on forecasting size curves of cocoon filaments is the foundation of computer simulation of silk reeling.
sentences.chinese: 繭絲纖度曲線的預測研究是計算機模擬繅絲的基礎。

sentences.english: Middle age is when broadness of mind and narrowness of waist change places.
sentences.chinese: 人到中年就是思想的寬度和腰圍的纖度對調。

sentences.english: Finally, pattern characteristic expression of size curves of cocoon filaments is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 最後，給出了一種繭絲纖度曲線的模式特徵表達方法。

sentences.english: The length of the size curves of cocoon filaments within one lot varies at random.
sentences.chinese: 一個莊口中各根繭絲纖度曲線的長短是隨機變化的。

sentences.english: At the same time we forecasted the denier, and optimized the extension process.
sentences.chinese: 預測了原絲纖度，對牽伸工藝進行了優化。
